properties.title: Frostbound
properties.summary: Embark on a wintry journey with Elise, a young woman possessing rare frostcraft magic, as she navigates political pressures and magical imbalances in a unique winter-bound realm. Uncover hidden secrets, balance duty with empathy, and confront an ancient storm-spirit that mirrors Elise's inner struggle.
properties.world_setting: The realm of Glaciala is a majestic winter wonderland with crystalized forests, towering ice-capped mountains, and ancient ruins cloaked in snow. Its people have a deep reverence for winter magic and folklore, drawing inspiration from mythical creatures and icy landscapes that shape their culture and traditions.

main_character.name: Elise
main_character.description: A young woman born with rare frostcraft—magic tied to snow, ice, and wind. As she grapples with her powers and the political pressures of her realm, Elise must navigate a complex inner journey of self-acceptance and understanding.

skills.name: Blizzard's Embrace
skills.description: Summons a protective blizzard to shield Elise from harm

items.name: Elder Frostweaver
items.description: A wise and ancient figure skilled in the ways of winter magic. The Elder Frostweaver guides and trains Elise in mastering her frostcraft abilities, imparting knowledge passed down through generations.

items.name: Councilor Astra
items.description: A cautious and pragmatic councilor who questions Elise's abilities and decisions, wary of the potential consequences of her powers. Councilor Astra provides a contrasting viewpoint to Elise's journey.

items.name: Frostbound Wanderer
items.description: A nomad well-versed in the ancient legends and myths of the winter realm. The Frostbound Wanderer shares tales of lost magic, forgotten deities, and elemental spirits, offering Elise glimpses into her realm's rich history.

items.title: Frozen Awakening
items.setting: The frozen city of Frosthold stands as a testament to Glaciala's ancient history, with its towering ice spires and shimmering snow-covered streets.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: The chill in the air whispers to me, urging me to embrace my frostcraft.

dialogue.speaker: Younger Sister
dialogue.line: Elise, what's happening? Your magic is getting out of control!

items.title: Trial of Ice and Fire
items.setting: The Frostpeak Mountains loom large in the distance, their jagged peaks piercing the wintry sky.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Frostweaver
dialogue.line: To master your frostcraft, you must learn to balance its icy power with the warmth of your spirit.

dialogue.speaker: Councilor Astra
dialogue.line: Do not let your abilities blind you to the consequences, Elise. The kingdom's safety must come first.

items.title: Whispers of the Frostbound
items.setting: The Whispering Woods are alive with the soft murmurs of ancient spirits, their icy breath touching the air with frost.

dialogue.speaker: Frostbound Wanderer
dialogue.line: The ice remembers, Elise. Listen to its tales and heed its warnings.

items.title: Shadows of the Storm-Spirit
items.setting: A colossal storm gathers on the horizon, its dark clouds swirling with malevolent intent as it approaches.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: I must confront the storm spirit within myself before it consumes everything I hold dear.

items.title: Thawing Hearts
items.setting: The Glacial Palace stands as a beacon of hope in the winter realm, its crystalline towers reflecting the light of a new dawn.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: I have found my place in this wintry world, embracing both my frostcraft and my heart's warmth.

skills.name: Snowfall Surge
skills.effect: Unleashes a torrent of snow and ice to freeze enemies in place

skills.name: Winter's Shield
skills.effect: Summons a protective barrier of ice to deflect incoming attacks

skills.name: Frostbound Fury
skills.effect: Channels raw frostcraft energy into devastating icy blasts

skills.name: Heart's Warmth
skills.effect: Empowers allies with a comforting warmth, boosting their morale

skills.name: Compassionate Resolve
skills.effect: Dispels negative emotions and debuffs from allies

skills.name: Harmony's Embrace
skills.effect: Fuses frostcraft with empathy to heal and strengthen allies

items.name: Frostblade
items.description: A blade forged from enchanted ice crystals, capable of freezing enemies upon contact.

items.name: Galebow
items.description: A bow crafted from winter winds, shooting arrows that summon icy gusts to slow and damage foes.

items.name: Snowflurry Staff
items.description: A staff adorned with swirling snowflakes, unleashing blizzards that freeze and damage multiple enemies.

items.name: Blizzardcleaver
items.description: An axe infused with the power of raging blizzards, cleaving through enemies with icy ferocity.

items.title: Echoes of Frostfall
items.description: As Elise explores the ancient ruins of Frostfall, she uncovers whispers of a forgotten winter deity, hinting at a deeper connection to her frostcraft magic.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: The ice resonates with a power long dormant, stirring memories within me.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Frostweaver
dialogue.line: Be cautious, Elise. The past holds secrets that may shape your future.

items.title: Frostfire Revelation
items.description: A sudden blizzard engulfs Elise's village, threatening to freeze all within its icy grasp. As she struggles to contain the storm, a fiery presence emerges, challenging her control over the elements.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: My frostcraft clashes with this fiery force, creating a dangerous dance of ice and flame.

dialogue.speaker: Councilor Astra
dialogue.line: Your duty is clear, Elise. Protect the village, even if it means facing your fears.

items.title: Embers of Betrayal
items.description: In the shimmering light of the Glacial Palace, Elise confronts a figure from her past, whose betrayal threatens to shatter the fragile peace of Glaciala. As secrets unravel, Elise must choose between loyalty to her realm and the bonds of family.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: Betrayal cuts deeper than any icy blade. I must tread carefully, for the storm within grows stronger.

dialogue.speaker: Younger Sister
dialogue.line: Elise, I believe in you. Together, we can weather any tempest, no matter how icy or fierce.
